title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled but do not have any effect when moved. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon.
OB: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. 3. However, the scrollbars do not have any effect.
EB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example and viewing a small image, the scrollbars should be disabled to avoid misleading the user.
SR: 1. Launch the application. 2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 3. Verify that the scrollbars are disabled when viewing a small image like an icon.
